lead_paragraph: A series of missteps cost the Romanian national ballet company on Tuesday its artistic director, Johan Kobborg, and the dancer Alina Cojocaru.

headline.print_headline: Romanian Ballet Company Loses Leading Lights
headline.main: Romanian Ballet Company Loses Its Leading Lights

snippet: A series of missteps cost the Romanian national ballet company on Tuesday its artistic director, Johan Kobborg, and the dancer Alina Cojocaru.
abstract: Johan Kobborg resigns as artistic director of Romanian National Ballet after Tiberiu-Ionut Soare, interim general manager of Bucharest National Opera, downgrades his position on website; several dancers, including Kobborg's fiancee Alina Cojocaru, refuse to perform and questions are raised about company's direction.
